Osu Map Object¶

class reamber.osu.OsuMapObj.OsuMapObj(backgroundFileName: 'str' = '', samples: 'OsuSampleList' = <factory>, hpDrainRate: 'float' = 5.0, circleSize: 'float' = 4.0, overallDifficulty: 'float' = 5.0, approachRate: 'float' = 5.0, sliderMultiplier: 'float' = 1.4, sliderTickRate: 'int' = 1, title: 'str' = '', titleUnicode: 'str' = '', artist: 'str' = '', artistUnicode: 'str' = '', creator: 'str' = '', version: 'str' = '', source: 'str' = '', tags: 'List[str]' = '', beatmapID: 'int' = 0, beatmapSetID: 'int' = -1, distanceSpacing: 'float' = 4, beatDivisor: 'int' = 4, gridSize: 'int' = 8, timelineZoom: 'float' = 0.3, audioFileName: 'str' = '', audioLeadIn: 'int' = 0, previewTime: 'int' = -1, countdown: 'bool' = False, sampleSet: 'int' = 0, stackLeniency: 'float' = 0.7, mode: 'int' = 3, letterboxInBreaks: 'bool' = False, specialStyle: 'bool' = False, widescreenStoryboard: 'bool' = True, notes: reamber.osu.lists.OsuNotePkg.OsuNotePkg = <factory>, bpms: reamber.osu.lists.OsuBpmList.OsuBpmList = <factory>, svs: reamber.osu.lists.OsuSvList.OsuSvList = <factory>)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

data() → Dict[str, reamber.base.lists.TimedList.TimedList]¶

Gets the notes, bpms and svs as a dictionary

readFile(filePath='')¶

Reads a .osu, loads inplace, hence it doesn’t return anything

Parameters

filePath – The path to the .osu file.

resetAllSamples(notes=True, samples=True) → None¶

Resets all hitsounds and samples

Parameters

  • notes – Whether to reset hitsounds on notes

  • samples – Whether to reset samples

writeFile(filePath='')¶

Writes a .osu, doesn’t return anything.

Parameters

filePath – The path to a new .osu file.

bpms: OsuBpmList¶
notes: OsuNotePkg¶
svs: OsuSvList¶
